annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Required information and manner
annotations.translation: 所需信息和方式

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 14. (1) For the purposes of regulation 13 (2)(a)(pre-booking information requirement), the required information
annotations.translation: 14. (1) 就第13 (2)(a)条（预订前信息要求）而言，所需信息

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (3) If another person (A) makes the booking on behalf of the passenger (whether or not A is also a passenger on the relevant service), the pre-booking information requirement is to be treated as complied with if the required information is provided to A in the required manner before the booking is made, along with a written request that A provide that information to the passenger unless A considers that, by virtue of age or mental capacity, the passenger is unlikely to be capable of understanding it.
annotations.translation: (3) 如果其他人 (A) 代表乘客进行预订（无论 A 是否也是相关服务的乘客），如果在预订前以要求的方式向 A 提供所需信息，以及书面要求 A 向乘客提供该信息，则预订前信息要求将被视为符合，除非 A 认为， 由于年龄或心智能力，乘客不太可能理解它。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (4) If another person (A) makes the booking on behalf of the passenger (whether or not A is also a passenger on the relevant service), the pre-departure information requirement is to be treated as complied with if the required information is provided to A in the required manner between 24 and 48 hours prior to the scheduled departure time of the relevant service, along with a written request that A provide that information to the passenger unless A considers that, by virtue of age or mental capacity, the passenger is unlikely to be capable of understanding it.
annotations.translation: (4) 若由他人 (A) 代为订座（无论A是否也是相关航班的旅客），如所要求的信息符合，则视为已满足出发前信息要求。在相关服务的预定出发时间之前 24 至 48 小时内按要求的方式向 A 提供该信息，并书面要求 A 向乘客提供该信息，除非 A 认为由于年龄或精神能力，乘客不太可能理解。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (5) If another person (A) checks in on behalf of the passenger (whether or not A is also a passenger on the relevant service), the check-in information requirement is to be treated as complied with if the required information was provided to A in the required manner at the time of check-in, along with a written request that A provide that information to the passenger unless A considers that, by virtue of age or mental capacity, the passenger is unlikely to be capable of understanding it.
annotations.translation: (5) 如由他人 (A) 代表旅客办理乘机手续（无论A是否也是相关航班的旅客），如提供了所需信息，则视为符合乘机信息要求在办理登机手续时以要求的方式向 A 提供信息，并书面要求 A 向乘客提供该信息，除非 A 认为乘客由于年龄或心智能力而不太可能理解该信息。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) in the case of online bookings
annotations.translation: (a) 就网上预订而言，如属以下情况：

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) must be displayed prominently on an operator's website or mobile application,
annotations.translation: (i) 必须在经营者网站或移动应用程序的显著位置显示、

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) is the information specified in Part 1 of Schedule 12 (information for passengers) and a hyperlink to each of the relevant websites;
annotations.translation: (ii) 是附表12第1部分（乘客信息）中规定的信息，以及指向每个相关网站的超链接；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) in the case of telephone bookings
annotations.translation: (b) 电话预订的情况

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) must be provided orally,
annotations.translation: (i) 必须口头提供、

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) is the information specified in Part 1 of Schedule 12;
annotations.translation: (ii) 附表12第1部分指明的资料；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) in the case of in-person bookings
annotations.translation: (c) 在亲自预订的情况下

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) must be provided orally or in writing,
annotations.translation: (i) 必须以口头或书面形式提供，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) where provided orally, is the information specified in Part 1 of Schedule 12,
annotations.translation: (ii) 如口头提供，为附表12第1部所指明的资料，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) where provided in writing, is a written notice which informs passengers of the requirements to provide information, to possess notification of a negative test result, to book and undertake tests and to self-isolate in regulations 3, 4, 6 and 9.
annotations.translation: (iii) 如果以书面形式提供，则是一份书面通知，告知乘客在第 3、4、6 和 9 条中提供信息、持有阴性检测结果通知、预订和进行测试以及自我隔离的要求。

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (2) For the purposes of regulation 13(2)(b) (pre-departure information requirement), the required information
annotations.translation: (2)  就条例13(2)(b)（出发前信息要求）而言，所需信息

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (a) must be provided by text message, push notification, email or orally;
annotations.translation: (a) 必须以简讯、推播通知、电子邮件或口头方式提供；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (b) where provided by text message or push notification, is text which
annotations.translation: (b) 在通过短信或推送通知提供的情况下，是

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (i) informs passengers of the requirements to provide information in regulation 3 and that penalties apply for failure to comply with those requirements,
annotations.translation: (i) 将第3条关于提供资料的规定通知乘客，并对未遵守该等规定者施加处罚，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (ii) includes a hyperlink to https://www.gov.uk/provide-journey-contact-details-before travel - uk,
annotations.translation: (ii) 包括链接 https://www.gov.uk/provide-journey-contact-details-before travel - uk，

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iii) informs passengers of the requirement to possess notification of a negative test result in regulation 4, and
annotations.translation: (iii) 告知乘客要求拥有第4条中阴性测试结果的通知，以及

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (iv) informs passengers of the requirement to book and undertake tests in regulation 6;
annotations.translation: (iv) 告知乘客第 6 条中预订和进行测试的要求；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (c) where provided orally, is the information specified in Part 1 of Schedule 12;
annotations.translation: (c) 如口头提供，则为附表12第1部所指明的信息；

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: (d) where provided by email, is the information specified in Part 1 of Schedule 12 and a hyperlink to each of the relevant websites.
annotations.translation: (d) 凡以电子邮件提供，则为附表12第1部分所指明的资料及每个有关网站的超连结。
